sourcesContent:
import { SCREENS } from '@common/hooks/use-screen-media-query.hook';

export const THEME = {
    ORANGE: '#f2b63e',
    GREEN: '#2e5a36',
    LIGHT_GRAY: '#f6f6f6',
    LIGHT_RED: '#ff726f40',
    GRAY: 'gray',
    READONLY_COLOR: '#e1e1e1',
    BLACK: 'black',
    SHADOW_GREEN_COLOR: '#9bccc6',
    MERINO: '#f3ecdc',

    ACCOUNT_MAX_WIDTH: `${SCREENS.xl}px`,
    ADMIN_MAX_WIDTH: `${SCREENS.xxl}px`,
    MAX_WIDTH: `${SCREENS.xxxl}px`,
    WHITE: '#ffffff',

    LEFT_MENU_WIDTH: '250px',
    RIGHT_MENU_WIDTH: '300px',
    SMALL_FONT_SIZE: '14px',
    BASE_FONT_SIZE: '16px',
    LARGE_FONT_SIZE: '20px',

    DISABLED_BACKGROUND: 'rgb(245, 245, 245)',
    BOX_SHADOW_ORANGE: `box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgb(0 0 0 / 8%), 0 0 8px #f2b63e`,
    BOX_SHADOW_GREEN: `box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgb(0 0 0 / 8%), 0 0 8px #2e5a36`,
    BOX_SHADOW_GRAY: `box-shadow: inset 0 1px 1px rgb(0 0 0 / 8%), 0 0 8px #ccc`,
};
